subject: Automobile Racing
Toys
Advertising and Marketing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Sales of die-cast Nascar racecars, which peaked at $250 million in 2002, plunged to less than one-third that figure last year.
snippet: Sales of die-cast Nascar racecars, which peaked at $250 million in 2002, plunged to less than one-third that figure last year.
